description: Moves the specified instances into the standby state. If you choose to decrement the desired capacity of the Auto Scaling group, the instances can enter standby as long as the desired capacity of the Auto Scaling group after the instances are placed into standby is equal to or greater than the minimum capacity of the group. If you choose not to decrement the desired capacity of the Auto Scaling group, the Auto Scaling group launches new instances to replace the instances on standby. For more information, see Temporarily removing instances from your Auto Scaling group in the Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling User Guide.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the instances. You can specify up to 20 instances. (string) ---

parameters.name: AutoScalingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group.

parameters.name: ShouldDecrementDesiredCapacity
parameters.description: Indicates whether to decrement the desired capacity of the Auto Scaling group by the number of instances moved to Standby mode.

nested_items.name: Activities
nested_items.description: The activities related to moving instances into Standby mode.

nested_items.name: AutoScalingGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A friendly, more verbose description of the activity.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the activity.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the activity.

nested_items.name: StatusCode
nested_items.description: The current status of the activity.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A friendly, more verbose description of the activity status.

nested_items.name: Progress
nested_items.description: A value between 0 and 100 that indicates the progress of the activity.

nested_items.name: AutoScalingGroupState
nested_items.description: The state of the Auto Scaling group, which is either InService or Deleted.

nested_items.name: AutoScalingGroupARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Auto Scaling group.
